summary: Two scam artists prey on women for their money. They clash in a Mediterranean hot spot. Will the cultured, high-class con artist come out on top, or will the rough small-change scammer rise to win the wager?
cast: Marlon Brando|David Niven|Shirley Jones|Dody Goodman|Aram Stephan|Parley Baer|Marie Windsor|Rebecca Sand|Frances Robinson|Henry Slate|Norman Alden|Susanne Cramer|Cynthia Lynn|Ilze Taurins|Francine York|John Banner|Brandon Beach|Barry Bernard|Brigitte Borkowski|Helga Borkowski|Barbara Bouchet|George Calliga|Peter Camlin|Albert Carrier|Albert Cavens|Danica D'Hondt|Jean Del Val|Bess Flowers|Wesley Gale|Ray Hemphill|Gladys Holland|Gita Kammann|Elise Kraal|Dan Krohn|Donald Lawton|Eleanor Leplat|Vitina Marcus|Alphonse Martell|Pamela Matthews|Gigi Michel|Jan Moriarty|George Nardelli|Eddie Ness|Mustapha Pasha|Thano Rama|Jean Ransome|Clark Ross|Don Ross|Gene Roth|Fran√ßoise Ruggieri|Rolfe Sedan|Bernard Sell|Ralph Smiley|Stephen Soldi|Beverly St. Lawrence|Sirry Steffen|Paul Toenniges|Mijanou Veine|Frank E. title: Dos seductores
